title: DSC Configuration set command result
description: Represents the data structure returned by the `dsc config set` command.

results.title: Results
results.description: The results of the `set` method for every DSC Resource instance in the DSC Configuration Document with the instance's name and type.

https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.title: Instance name
https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.description: The short, human-readable name for a DSC Resource instance. Must be unique within a DSC Configuration document.

https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.title: DSC Resource fully qualified type name
https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.description:
The namespaced name of the DSC Resource, using the syntax:

owner[.group][.area]/name

For example:

  - Microsoft.SqlServer/Database
  - Microsoft.SqlServer.Database/User

https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.title: DSC Resource set result
https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.description: Describes the return data for a DSC Resource instance from the `dsc resource set` command.

before_state.title: State before enforcing
before_state.description: This property always represents the desired state of the DSC Resource instance before the `set` method runs. DSC validates this return value against the DSC Resource's schema.

after_state.title: State after enforcing
after_state.description: This property always represents the current state of the DSC Resource instance as returned by its `set` method after enforcing the desired state. DSC validates this return value against the DSC Resource's schema.

changed_properties.title: Changed Properties
changed_properties.description: This property always represents the list of property names for the DSC Resource instance that the `set` method modified. When this value is an empty array, the `set` method didn't enforce any properties for the instance.

https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.title: Messages
https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.description: A list of structured messages emitted by the DSC Resources during an operation.

https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.title: Had Errors
https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.description: Indicates whether any of the DSC Resources returned a non-zero exit code.

https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.title: Message
https://schemas.microsoft.com/dsc/2023/0.description: A message emitted by a DSC Resource with associated metadata.

name.title: Message source instance name
name.description: The short, human-readable name for the instance that emitted the message, as defined in the DSC Configuration Document.

message.title: Message content
message.description: The actual content of the message as emitted by the DSC Resource.

level.title: Message level
level.description: Indicates the severity of the message.
